name: Rainy Day with Teddy
description:
spend a day with teddy !! the rain is so comfy, jus red his positive thoughts by clicking on items !! music by me, rain sounds and rattle sound are from the FreeSound sound library. all drawings, including the font are by me. pls do not redistribute !thank u for ur support !!
